Method Detail

addTriangles

public void addTriangles(EigenMeat.EigenMaze.Triangle[] triangles)
Adds an array of Triangle objects to the main triangle list for the Octree. This is called before the Octree itself is created.

Parameters:
triangles - an array of triangles to be added

clearTriangles

public void clearTriangles()
Clear all the triangles from the Octree

public void generate()
Generate the Octree with the triangles in the triangle list.

draw

public void draw(net.java.games.jogl.GLDrawable gldraw,
                 EigenMeat.EigenMaze.Frustum frustum)
Draws the Octree by only drawing nodes that are in the camera frustum.

Parameters:
gldraw - jogl gl interface
frustum - the frustum to check against

Draw the Octree's shadow volume.

Parameters:
gldraw - GLDrawable

checkCollision

public void checkCollision(MobileEntity entity)
Checks a collision between an entity and triangles in the Octree. This also handles collision reaction if collision is detected.

Parameters:
entity - entity to check
